section.title: Operating Samba 4 as a read-only domain controller
section.para:
Active Directory offers an operating mode called read-only domain controller (RODC) with the following properties:
The data are only stored in read-only format; all write changes must be performed on another domain controller.
Consequently, replication is only performed in one direction.
A comprehensive description can be found in the Microsoft TechNet Library .
A Samba 4 domain controller can be operated in RODC mode (on a &ucsSlave; for example). Prior to the installation of univention-samba4, the &ucsUCRV; samba4/role must be set to RODC:
section.programlisting: ucr set samba4/role=RODC univention-install univention-samba4 univention-run-join-scripts
